events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted the mortgage loan application for their new home purchase.
Application was reviewed and categorised under mortgage loan based on keywords found in the submitted documents.
A loan officer has been assigned to the application to guide the applicant through the mortgage approval process.
Initial review of the application revealed that all primary documents are submitted with minor clarifications needed.
Additional documents including the property appraisal report and proof of homeowners insurance were requested.
The applicant has submitted all requested documents, including appraisal and insurance proof, ahead of schedule.
The credit check has been completed and shows a strong credit history suitable for mortgage approval consideration.
Risk assessment conducted indicating moderate risk due to loan amount in relation to applicant's income.
A mortgage loan offer detailing interest rates and repayment plans has been presented to the applicant.
Applicant has reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback expressing intent to proceed with the mortgage.
Mortgage loan has been officially approved after successful completion of all checks and applicant approvals.
The mortgage funds have been disbursed to the sellerâ€™s account for property purchase closing.
Follow-up with the applicant scheduled to ensure all closing documents are in order and answer any questions.
The mortgage application has been successfully closed following completion of all post-approval procedures.
